snippet: WEISSELBERG--Edward, beloved husband of Myrna. Devoted father of Debi Cassuto and her husband, Hanoch, Michael Weisselberg and his wife, Randi and Dianne Weisselberg. Loving grandfather of Shai, Eran, Keren, Reut, Rebecca, Jillian, Kayla and Nicole. Dear brother of Dorothy Berson. Ed was President and Chairman of the Board of Wyssmont Drying Manufacturers of Fort Lee, NJ and he was active in many community organizations including, Past President of Temple Beth El of the Northern Valley in Closter, NJ, Past President of the Jewish Congregation of Kinnelon, NJ. Ed's community interests included the ADL, serving on its National Commission. Serving on the Boards of the Dwight Englewood School of Englewood, NJ, the Hebrew Union College-Jewish Institution of Religion and the Society for the Protection of Nature in Israel. 1/3
